title: Do I sell Her or DO I keep My Tiger 23

posts.content:
Now I am In two minds wether to keep my babe, for the right Money and I mean right money do I sell my 23, as Ive got to fund some other stuff or put it on the back burner.
So I am in a dilema, keep or sell, food for thought, its got to be the right money, bear in mind I spent well over 28 k without labour, 3 years worth on and off, mostly everythins new, running gear and all mechanicals, so If anyone knows anyone that wants a great "Â£ put em in touch Via www.gingersbuses.co.uk. Please dont contact me unless ur deadly serious Cheers Mark Hopley

Yeah sell her mark i suppose if your running a vw restoration business your 23 would be a great add. So i think we have all seen her out and about and i'm sure you can replace her in the future cashflow is king matey.

Take care key

ps hope to meet up again soon x local lad and all that
Hi Buzz u off to BVF or need I ask, See U there mate. Sure we'll have a drink Cheers Mark

Hi Buzz u off to BVF or need I ask, See U there mate. Sure we'll have a drink Cheers Mark
_________________
I've been roped into going to the pod so not 100% yet bloody bloody race cars and all that.

up late then????????

What are you thinking of doing next??, but i agree with buzzers... another bus will always come along again.

Deano
